name: Chicken Curry
steps:
Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add diced onion and cook until golden.
Add minced garlic and ginger, cook for 1 minute.
Add curry powder and garam masala, stir for 30 seconds.
Add diced tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add chicken and cook for 5 minutes.
Add coconut milk and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve over rice.
